DOC.brief_summary: Background : Aim : Clinical evaluation effectiveness two different polyethylene glycol dose maintenance treatment functional constipation child . Study design : Randomized , open-label trial . Randomized , double-blind , placebo control trial .
DOC.detailed_description: Children randomly assign 2 group receive polyethylene glycol 4000 ( Forlax ) initial dose either 0.3g/kg , 0.7 g / kg . In case ineffectiveness dose medication increase every two week 0.2 g/kg . The indication increase dose le 3 bowel movement per week . For child diarrhea define 3 loose stool minimum 2 day or/and severe abdominal pain macrogol dose reduce every two week 0.2 g/kg . The intervention last 6 week .
